short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LifeDesk: a feature-rich new tab with wallpapers, quick tools, daily inspiration, and easy access to essential apps and sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LifeDesk is a comprehensive Chrome extension designed to transform your new tab into a dynamic, visually appealing, and productive digital workspace. It combines captivating wallpaper slideshows and video backgrounds with powerful productivity tools, including quick notes, task management, and organized access to essential apps and websites. LifeDesk streamlines your browsing experience with shortcuts to popular sites, tools for QR code creation, URL shortening, text extraction from images, and weather updatesâ€”all in one place. Enhance your browsing with a beautiful, functional new tab that brings inspiration, convenience, and productivity to every session.
